Pull Project Code,build and run

From Elastos Developer Website
Jump to: navigation, search



Import ElastosRDKforUbuntu




Set ElastosRDKforUbuntu local destination





Delete readme in Sources directory

Delete the readme.txt in ~/ElastosRDKforUbuntu/Sources.



Import Elastos




Set Elastos local destination

Set Elastos local destination in ~/ElastosRDKforUbuntu/Sources.



Import finished




Run Setup.sh

Run the setup.sh script. You can find it in ~/ElastosRDKforUbuntu/Setup.

Shortcuts on desktop



Build elastos code in sources

Open RDK box by double click the shortcut of Arm Android, and run emake commond.



Change to Targets directory

Change to Targets directory by run pd @ commond after emake.



Start emulator and eldrop

a. Run emu -c to start emulator.
b. Run eldrop to push elastos object files to device.


emulator




Start adb shell

Run elrsh to open adb shell windows.



Run TextViewDemo Sample

a.Change the current directory to /data/data/com.elastos.runtime/elastos
b.Run ./superexe -app TextViewDemo to lunch the TextViewDemo sample.


all the windows



TextViewDemo in emulator
